pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Spark MLlib runtime for MLServerThis package provides a MLServer runtime compatible with Spark MLlib.## UsageYou can install the runtime, alongside `mlserver`, as:```bashpip install mlserver mlserver-mllib```For further information on how to use MLServer with Spark MLlib, you can checkout the [MLServer repository](https://github.com/SeldonIO/MLServer).
